topic.title: Cognitive Status Result Organizer - conformance rules

section.p: This clinical statement identifies a set of cognitive status result observations. It contains information applicable to all of the contained cognitive status result observations. A result organizer may be used to group questions in a Patient Health Questionaire (PHQ). An appropriate nullFlavor can be used when the organizer/code or organizer/id is unknown.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:14375, CONF:14376 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.75"
SHALL conform to Result Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.1)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="CLUSTER" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14369, R2.1=CONF:1198-14369)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14371, R2.1=CONF:1198-14371)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:14377, R2.1=CONF:1198-14377)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:14372, R2.1=CONF:1198-14372, R2.1=CONF:1198-19093)

SHALL contain [1..*] component such that it (CONF:14373, CONF:14381)
Conforms to Cognitive Status Result Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.74)
code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @code should be selected from ICF (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.254) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:14697, CONF:14698)
SHALL conform to Result Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.1)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="CLUSTER" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14369, R2.1=CONF:1198-14369)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14371, R2.1=CONF:1198-14371)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:14377, R2.1=CONF:1198-14377)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:14372, R2.1=CONF:1198-14372, R2.1=CONF:1198-19093)

SHALL contain [1..*] component such that it (CONF:14373, CONF:14381)
Conforms to Cognitive Status Result Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.74)

The value for 'code' in a result organizer SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) and MAY be selected from CPT-4 (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12). Laboratory results SHOULD be from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or other constrained terminology named by the US Department of Health and Human Services Office of National Coordinator or other federal agency. Local and/or regional codes for laboratory results SHOULD also be allowed. (CONF:7164)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="CLUSTER" Cluster (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) OR SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="BATTERY" Battery (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7165)
code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @code should be selected from ICF (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.254) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:14697, CONF:14698)

body.codeblock: <organizer xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="CLUSTER" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.75"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.1"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="241669632"/> <code code="1711021465"/> <statusCode code="completed"/> <component> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.74"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.74"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1426055453"/> <code code="373930000" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT" displayName="Cognitive function finding"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <author/> <entryRelationship> <supply classCode="SPLY"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.50"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1559532939"/> <code code="149299505"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> </supply> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.72"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="2103433181"/> <code code="1219920685"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <participant typeCode="IND"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1629486175"/> <code code="1289842381"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <author/> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.86"/> <statusCode code="completed"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <referenceRange/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <referenceRange> <observationRange/> </referenceRange> </observation> </component> </organizer>
